segmentosSRT.text: A dog's gotta eat shit! Little bastard!
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_21

segmentosSRT.text: Of all you could have learned, bastard!
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_21

segmentosSRT.text:
- What'd he just say?
- Nothing. Eat.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_21

segmentosSRT.text: Your wife's been waiting for ages.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_21

segmentosSRT.text: My heart is full of sorrow
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_21

segmentosSRT.text: Me and my lover want more time
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_21

segmentosSRT.text: One, two, three. One, two, three.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_21

segmentosSRT.text:
Dying like this,
their families won't even know.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_21

segmentosSRT.text: and we run for our lives
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_21

segmentosSRT.text: I'll hang it on the wall.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_21

segmentosSRT.text:
1958: Mao Zedong launches
the "Great Leap Forward."
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_21

segmentosSRT.text:
Steel production is now targeted
at 10.7 million tonnes per year.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_21

segmentosSRT.text: Every household donates its iron utensils.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_21

segmentosSRT.text:
If you take all our pots away,
how will we cook?
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_21

segmentosSRT.text: We're off to the next house.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_21

segmentosSRT.text: We are not going to liberate Taiwan?
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_21

segmentosSRT.text: Sure we are. We'll definitely liberate Taiwan.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_21

segmentosSRT.text: That guy's word is law? The government?
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_21

segmentosSRT.text: Good, it'll be hot and sour soup.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_21

segmentosSRT.text: A kid still has to sleep.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_21

segmentosSRT.text:
Smelting steel is a duty.
We can't be politically backward.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_21

segmentosSRT.text: Your classmates are already on their way.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_21

segmentosSRT.text:
We have to try and bear it,
even in the worst of times.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_21

segmentosSRT.text: We mustn't let his mother see.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_21

segmentosSRT.text:
You never had the chance to eat
the dumplings I packed for you.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_21

segmentosSRT.text: Youqing, can you ever forgive me?
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_21

segmentosSRT.text: I shouldn't have let you go, Youqing!
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_21

segmentosSRT.text: Remember, you owe us a life.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_21

segmentosSRT.text: Yes, and run if he has to.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_21

segmentosSRT.text: Have something to eat first. Lunch is ready.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_21

segmentosSRT.text: Comrade, could I look at that one?
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_21

segmentosSRT.text: I'll get some water so you can wash up.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_21

segmentosSRT.text:
The ship of revolution! Advance
through the storm with Chairman Mao!
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_21

segmentosSRT.text: We've no photos of Fengxia as a child.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_21

segmentosSRT.text: Fengxia, after the child is born...
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_21

segmentosSRT.text: Mr. Niu, is your wife at home?
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_21

segmentosSRT.text: Here, bite on this. It'll save your teeth.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_21

segmentosSRT.text: Let us have a quick peek, please?
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_21

segmentosSRT.text: What's wrong with him? What happened?
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_21

segmentosSRT.text: It was the water that did it.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_21

segmentosSRT.text: Please, Doctor, she's my only daughter.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_21
